  • Constructor Details

    • FirebaseAnnouncementController

      public FirebaseAnnouncementController()

  • Method Details

    • addAnnouncement

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<String>> addAnnouncement(String eventId, Announcement announcement)
      Attempts to add an announcement to a specific event and then notifies the event's attendees. First, it fetches the event attendee IDs. If successful, it proceeds to add the announcement to the event's "Announcements" collection. Regardless of the outcome, it attempts to notify attendees by processing the announcements for each user.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to add the announcement to.
      announcement - The Announcement object containing the announcement details.
      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to a list of strings. On success, this list is empty, indicating that the announcement was added and processed successfully. If fetching attendees fails, the list contains just the eventId to indicate failure in fetching attendees. If adding the announcement fails but fetching attendee IDs succeeds, the list returns the user IDs to indicate the intended recipients of the failed announcement.

    • setupAnnouncementListListener

      public com.google.firebase.firestore.ListenerRegistration setupAnnouncementListListener(String userid, ArrayList<Announcement> announcementDataList, AnnouncementArrayAdapter adapter, android.widget.TextView emptyAnnouncement, android.widget.ListView listView)
      Sets up a listener to fetch announcements for a specific user and populate the provided list view. This method listens for changes in the user's "Announcements" collection and updates the list view accordingly. It filters the announcements based on the user's role in each announcement.
      Parameters:
      userid - The unique identifier of the user to fetch announcements for.
      announcementDataList - The list to populate with fetched announcements.
      adapter - The AnnouncementArrayAdapter to update with new announcements.
      emptyAnnouncement - The TextView to show when the list is empty.
      listView - The ListView to populate with announcements.
      Returns:
      A ListenerRegistration object representing the listener setup.
